repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:16

EXPOSE 7000

ENV NODE_ENV production
ENV NODE_PORT 7000
ENV TZ utc

WORKDIR /app

RUN mkdir -p /tmp/timestamp
VOLUME /tmp/timestamp

COPY package.json /app
COPY package-lock.json /app
RUN npm install --production --no-optional && npm cache clean --force;

COPY src /app/src

CMD [ "npm", "start" ]
